revised_title: A Diffusion Model for Fatigue Crack Growth Analysis
tldr: This article presents a diffusion model for the propagation of fatigue cracks, showing that fatigue crack growth can be described by a transition density function and the probability of a fatigue crack reaching a critical size can be determined by solving the diffusion equation. The model considers the crack tip position as a state variable and demonstrates how the fatigue life of a cracked part is related to the transition probability.
